description: Puffer warmth for the slopes or school, this waterproof, wind-resistant ski jacket has a thermal-reflective lining that retains heat, recycled synthetic down insulation, and a suite of mountain-ready features. Plus, its Outgrown™ system allows you to keep up with inevitable growth spurts, for wear over several seasons.
name: Winter Powder II Quilted Jacket - Youth Boys

specs.value: 100% Polyester, Omni-Heat™ Synthetic Down 100% Recycled Polyester, Omni-Tech™ Plain Weave 2L 100% polyester
Microtemp XF II 150g, Omni Heat Synthetic Down
